Comment: Correct,  if you are not snarky, you are not Californian.    Newsom seems one of the few Dems who is actively trying to figure out what is wrong with the Dem Party.  He has the bonus of being Governor of what is now as of 2025 the 4th largest economy in the world.  He is probably the only Dem who can get big tech and big business backing, for better or worse.   He is also one of the only Dems, and politicians for the matter, who could sell an economic message to the masses.    As for Harris, despite polling way ahead of other possible candidates, I doubt the DNC will run her.  As of now, their main focus for 2028 is to find common ground between progressives and moderates, and to sell the economic message.  Once again, Newsom, despite ticking off some on the left, is one of the only candidates right now who is checking off the most boxes.    AOC will be too young on Inauguration Day to Constitutionally become POTUS, but she could run as VP.    Here is the thing, historically Trump starts talking shit about those he deems as threats early on.  Right now, he is delivering jabs at Newsom and to a lesser extent, AOC.  I know I will get flamed for this, but right now the best Dem ticket would be Newsom with AOC as VP.
